arguments.name: Text
arguments.description: The text or the reference to a cell containing text for which you want to substitute characters.

arguments.name: Old_text
arguments.description: The text you want to replace.

arguments.name: New_text
arguments.description: The text you want to replace old_text with.

arguments.name: Instance_num
arguments.description: Specifies which occurrence of old_text you want to replace with new_text. If you specify instance_num, only that instance of old_text is replaced. Otherwise, every occurrence of old_text in text is changed to new_text.
